items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
items.title: jsuites/jsuites: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: JavaScript (JS) is the most popular lightweight, interpreted compiled programming language. It can be used for both Client-side as well as Server-side developments. JavaScript also known as a scripting language for web pages.

items.content_html: The Node.js String Manipulation Module simplifies common string operations, allowing you to effortlessly transform and analyze strings in your applications. This lightweight module provides a collection of functions designed to handle a variety of tasks, from changing letter cases to counting characters and more.
items.title: ishansingh1010/stringManipulatorJs: The Node.js String Manipulation Module simplifies common string operations, allowing you to effortlessly transform and analyze strings in your applications. This lightweight module provides a collection of functions designed to handle a variety of tasks, from changing letter cases to counting characters and more.

items.content_html: Air-rest-api is a cutting-edge, lightweight RESTful API framework written in TypeScript and designed to streamline the development and deployment of robust and efficient APIs. With an emphasis on simplicity, speed, and flexibility, this framework empowers developers to create high-performance REST APIs effortlessly.
items.title: Mullayam/air-rest-api: Air-rest-api is a cutting-edge, lightweight RESTful API framework written in TypeScript and designed to streamline the development and deployment of robust and efficient APIs. With an emphasis on simplicity, speed, and flexibility, this framework empowers developers to create high-performance REST APIs effortlessly.
